job.title: AI/ML - Machine Learning Engineer, Siri Understanding
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brWant to join the team building an intelligent assistant that helps millions of people get things done You will be part of a crossfunctional team consisting of software engineers machine learning scientists and ASR specialists working to make Siri better every day To succeed in this role you must be passionate about speech technologies be a strong collaborator enjoy learning new things and tackle problems creativelybrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brExpertise in developing systems for automatic speech recognition natural language processing and machine learningbrbrFamiliarity with largescale data processing and distributed systemsbrbrStrong coding skills in PythonbrbrExcellent understanding of algorithms data structures coding standardsbrbrSelfmotivated and proactive with multitasking and critical thinking capabilitiesbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brYou will be a part of a team thats responsible for a wide variety of speechrelated datadriven research and development activities including acoustic modeling language modeling and tools development You should be passionate about building phenomenal products Because youll be working closely with engineers from a number of other teams at Apple youre a standout colleague who thrives in a dynamic environment with rapidly changing prioritiesbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBS MS in Computer Science Computer Engineering or equivalent degreebrbr brRole Number 200262069brbr
